data.coursename: CFA L1 基础课（体验课）
data.chaptername: CFA Ethic and Professional Standards and Quantitative Methods
data.sql:
select bit_note_lesson.id as id,bit_note_lesson.is_public as isPublic,bit_note_lesson.modify_date as updateTime,bit_note_lesson.content as content,bit_note_lesson.member_id as memberId,bit_note_lesson.client_type as clientType,bit_note_lesson.img_path as imgPath,bit_note_lesson.course_id as courseId,bit_note_lesson.lesson_category_id as charpterId,bit_note_lesson.task_type as taskType,bit_note_lesson.note_date as taskprogress,bit_note_lesson.course_resourse_id as taskId,bit_note_lesson.sound_path as soundPath,bit_note_lesson.sound_len as soundlen,
		bit_course.title as coursename,
		bit_lesson_category.name as chaptername,
		bit_note_lesson.praise_count as praiseCount,bit_note_lesson.favorite_count as favoriteCount,bit_note_lesson.click_count as clickCount,
		bit_member.nickname as nikeName,bit_member.avatar_default as headImg,bit_member.is_avatar as isAvatar,bit_member.user_level as userlevel from `bit_note_lesson` left join `bit_course` on bit_note_lesson.course_id = bit_course.id left join `bit_lesson_category` on bit_note_lesson.lesson_category_id = bit_lesson_category.id left join bit_member on bit_note_lesson.member_id = bit_member.id where  bit_note_lesson.id ='9283b122de3811e7a34800163e0f5ece' limit 0,1
